title: You know what I really love.
body:
Not being able to complete missions, through no fault of my own...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
I'm still salty about not being able to get the icon from the Star Guardian premade quest. 

...I like collecting icons.
Yep, if you aren't a 5 man, rito just doesn't love you.
I actually did that mission at least 4 times when I was playing solo

Feels bad :(

Same here, the people I did manage to get in a group with (just not enough of them), even timed it every time...

I was 14 day banned so I didn't have to worry about those infuriating missions. They made me more toxic than I like to admit. When I am trying to do my missions, kids who jeopardize my missions need to be told to stfu or gtfo.
